data.name: The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack is a collection of the original Fancy Pants games from creator Brad Borne - the renowned series that set the bar for Flash games, and defined a generation of platformers.

Worlds 1-3 (including the World 1 Remaster + Remix), and Fancy Snowboarding - all compiled for the first time! This collection aims to preserve the legacy of The Fancy Pants Adventures as you remember them, compiled for your convenience, with new quality of life features for a modern context.
(The World 2 Remaster is in-progress, and will be added for free upon it's completion!)

Fancy Features

  • Classic Pack - All the classic Worlds available in one location
  • Widescreen support - Brad altered the code of every World to support widescreen, and at higher resolutions than ever
  • Treasure Trove - Concept art, animations, early prototypes, demos, and more for the ultimate Fancy Pants fans!
  • Steam Achievements - Prove you're the best by collecting every secret, and completing every challenge
  • Localization - FPA has always had a worldwide audience, which is now fully supported and integrated
  • Controller support - Use the same keyboard you did 15 years ago, or plug in and play with controller support!
  • Silky smooth gameplay - A smooth, reliable experience, untethered from browser limitations. This means stable framerates and no lag for all Worlds, for the very first time! (The Remaster + Remix ALSO have full 60 fps support)
data.about_the_game:
The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack is a collection of the original Fancy Pants games from creator Brad Borne - the renowned series that set the bar for Flash games, and defined a generation of platformers.

Worlds 1-3 (including the World 1 Remaster + Remix), and Fancy Snowboarding - all compiled for the first time! This collection aims to preserve the legacy of The Fancy Pants Adventures as you remember them, compiled for your convenience, with new quality of life features for a modern context.

data.short_description: The classic Flash game series, compiled as a complete desktop collection for the first time. Experience the series that set the bar for platforming games throughout the industry!
data.reviews:
“The Fancy Pants Adventure series brings to the table some of the best platforming action you can have. So, put on the fanciest pants you own and experience Brad Borne's charming adventure series.”
4.6/5 – jayisgames

“Fancy Pants Adventure was a big day for Flash gaming, in my opinion, having introduced a fresh, original platformer with tons of quality and charm. Brad Borne reminded people how cool Flash games could be.”
4.7/5 – Tom Fulp

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX v10.9 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
